name: Light and Dark Mazes
description:
Find the buttons within the mazes of the blinding light and pitch darkness. Each ghost can only see a short distance around them and they move in opposite directions of each other. Once both ghosts are on their buttons, the level is complete. 

Directions: 

w,a,s,d or the arrow keys move the ghosts around the screen

Space will bring up the pause menu

Happy playing! :)
